languages.text: "То, что тебя ненавидят и считают опасн{mf|ым|ой} враги Человечества, не означает, что ты чист{mf||а} перед Императором. Но, возможно, Он решил провести тебя по иному пути — пути праведного ксеноцида и кровавого искупления своих провинностей. Я не дерзаю перечить Его воле".

"That you are loathed and feared by the enemies of Humanity does not make you pure in the eyes of the Emperor. But perhaps He saw fit to set you on a different path, one of righteous xenocide and blood-soaked redemption for your faults. I would never dare to gainsay His will."
languages.original_text: "То, что тебя ненавидят и считают опасн{mf|ым|ой} враги Человечества, не означает, что ты чист{mf||а} перед Императором. Но, возможно, Он решил провести тебя по иному пути — пути праведного ксеноцида и кровавого искупления своих провинностей. Я не дерзаю перечить Его воле".

traits.locale_text: "That you are loathed and feared by the enemies of Humanity does not make you pure in the eyes of the Emperor. But perhaps He saw fit to set you upon a different path, one of righteous xenocide and blood-soaked redemption for your faults. I would never dare to go against His will."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “你被人类之敌厌憎、畏惧，但这并不能让你在帝皇眼中变得更加纯洁。不过，或许帝皇认为你应该踏上另一条道路，一条以正义之名屠戮异形的道路，让人类之敌血债血偿的道路。我不该违背祂的旨意。”
languages.original_text: "That you are loathed and feared by the enemies of Humanity does not make you pure in the eyes of the Emperor. But perhaps He saw fit to set you on a different path, one of righteous xenocide and blood-soaked redemption for your faults. I would never dare to gainsay His will."

traits.locale_text: “你被人类之敌厌憎、畏惧，但这并不能让你在帝皇眼中变得更加纯洁。不过，或许帝皇认为你应该踏上另一条道路，一条以正义之名屠戮异形，让人类之敌血债血偿的道路。我不该违背祂的旨意。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「お前が人類の敵に憎まれ、恐れられているからといって、皇帝の目に純粋な者として写るわけではない。だが主は、お前が別の道に進むのに適していると判断されるかもしれない。それは正義の異種族殺害、血塗られた贖罪の道だ。主の意思に逆らう勇気は、私にはない」
languages.original_text: "That you are loathed and feared by the enemies of Humanity does not make you pure in the eyes of the Emperor. But perhaps He saw fit to set you on a different path, one of righteous xenocide and blood-soaked redemption for your faults. I would never dare to gainsay His will."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が人類の敵に憎まれ、恐れられているからといって、皇帝の目に純粋な者として写るわけではない。だが主は、お前が別の道に進むのに適していると判断されるかもしれない。それは正義の異種族殺害、血塗られた贖罪の道だ。主の意思に逆らう勇気は、私にはない」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Que sea odiad{mf|o|a} y temid{mf|o|a} por los enemigos de la humanidad no {mf|le|la} convierte en alguien puro a ojos del Emperador. Tal vez Él consideró oportuno poner{mf|le|la} en un camino distinto, uno de xenocidio justo y redención sangrienta por sus fallos. Nunca me atrevería a contradecir Su voluntad».
languages.original_text: "That you are loathed and feared by the enemies of Humanity does not make you pure in the eyes of the Emperor. But perhaps He saw fit to set you on a different path, one of righteous xenocide and blood-soaked redemption for your faults. I would never dare to gainsay His will."

traits.locale_text: «Que sea odiad{mf|o|a} y temid{mf|o|a} por los enemigos de la humanidad no {mf|le|la} convierte en alguien puro a ojos del Emperador. Tal vez Él consideró oportuno poner{mf|le|la} en un camino distinto, uno de xenocidio justo y redención sangrienta por sus fallos. Nunca me atrevería a ir en contra de Su voluntad».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Dass die Feinde der Menschheit Euch hassen und fürchten, macht Euch in den Augen des Imperators nicht rein. Doch vielleicht hat er in seiner Weisheit entschieden, Euch auf einen anderen Pfad zu schicken, einen des rechtschaffenen Xenozids und der blutgetränkten Buße für Eure Fehler. Ich würde es niemals wagen, mich seinem Willen zu widersetzen."
languages.original_text: "That you are loathed and feared by the enemies of Humanity does not make you pure in the eyes of the Emperor. But perhaps He saw fit to set you on a different path, one of righteous xenocide and blood-soaked redemption for your faults. I would never dare to gainsay His will."

traits.locale_text: "Dass die Feinde der Menschheit Euch hassen und fürchten, macht Euch in den Augen des Imperators nicht rein. Doch vielleicht hat er in seiner Weisheit entschieden, Euch auf einen anderen Pfad zu schicken, einen des rechtschaffenen Xenozids und der blutgetränkten Buße für Eure Fehler. Ich würde es niemals wagen, mich seinem Willen zu widersetzen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Que les ennemis de l'humanité vous détestent autant qu'ils vous craignent ne fait pas de vous quelqu'un de pur aux yeux de l'Empereur. Mais peut-être vous a-t-Il volontairement fait emprunter une voie différente, celle d'un xénocide vertueux et d'une rédemption sanglante pour expier vos fautes. Jamais je n'oserai aller à l'encontre de Sa volonté. »
languages.original_text: "That you are loathed and feared by the enemies of Humanity does not make you pure in the eyes of the Emperor. But perhaps He saw fit to set you on a different path, one of righteous xenocide and blood-soaked redemption for your faults. I would never dare to gainsay His will."

traits.locale_text: « Que les ennemis de l'humanité vous détestent autant qu'ils vous craignent ne fait pas de vous quelqu'un de pur aux yeux de l'Empereur. Mais peut-être vous a-t-Il volontairement fait emprunter une voie différente, celle d'un xénocide vertueux et d'une rédemption sanglante pour expier vos fautes. Jamais je n'oserai aller à l'encontre de Sa volonté. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "İnsanlığın düşmanlarının sana nefret ve korkuyla bakması, İmparator'un gözünde saf olduğun anlamına gelmez. Ancak belki de O sana farklı bir yol bahşetmiştir... Yanlışlarının telafisini, erdemli zenokıyımlarla ve kan dökerek yapacağın bir yol. O'nun iradesine karşı çıkma cüretinde bulunamam."
languages.original_text: "That you are loathed and feared by the enemies of Humanity does not make you pure in the eyes of the Emperor. But perhaps He saw fit to set you on a different path, one of righteous xenocide and blood-soaked redemption for your faults. I would never dare to gainsay His will."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlığın düşmanlarının sana nefret ve korkuyla bakması, İmparator'un gözünde saf olduğun anlamına gelmez. Ancak belki de O sana farklı bir yol, yanlışlarının telafisini, erdemli zenokıyımlarla ve kan dökerek yapacağın bir yol bahşetmiştir. O'nun iradesine karşı çıkma cüretinde bulunamam."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
